post.description: Authenticate user with email and password, returns access and refresh tokens

401.description: Invalid credentials - email or password is incorrect

post.description: Generate new access and refresh tokens using a valid refresh token
Logout user by clearing their refresh token from the database

401.description: User not authenticated - JWT token is missing or invalid

post.description: Send password reset email to user with reset link (always returns success for security)

200.description: Password reset email sent (if email exists)

message.example: If the email exists, a password reset link has been sent

post.description: Reset user password using valid reset token from email
Register new user with email, password, and profile information

requestBody.description: User registration data (Admin role creation is not allowed for security)

400.description: Invalid data or email already exists

delete.summary: Delete user by id with cascade deletion (admin only)

post.summary: Confirm password change with token from email

post.description: Creates a new project with the provided data. Only admins can create projects.

409.description: Project with this unique ID already exists

get.description: Retrieves all projects for the authenticated user with optional filtering. User ID is automatically extracted from JWT token.
Retrieves a project by its ID. Users can only access their own projects.

403.description: Forbidden - Access denied to this project

put.description: Updates an existing project. Users can only update their own projects.

403.description: Forbidden - Access denied to this project

409.description: Project with this unique ID already exists

delete.description: Deletes a project. Users can only delete their own projects.

403.description: Forbidden - Access denied to this project

get.description: Retrieves a project by its unique ID. Users can only access their own projects.

403.description: Forbidden - Access denied to this project

get.description: Checks if a project unique ID is available for use.

available.description: Whether the unique ID is available

uniqueId.description: The unique ID that was checked

post.description: Creates a new participant for a specific project. Admin authentication required.

400.description: Invalid participant data or participant ID already exists

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all participants for a specific project

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of participants to return (default: 20)

get.summary: Get all participants for a project

get.description: Retrieves information about a specific project participant

delete.description: Removes a participant from a project

parameters.name: participantId
parameters.description: ID of the participant to delete

post.description: Creates a new participant for a specific project with external participant ID. No authentication required for mobile app usage.

400.description: Invalid participant data or participant ID already exists

post.summary: Create a new project participant (Mobile App)

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all chats where the user is either admin or participant. User ID is automatically extracted from JWT token.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of chats to return (default: 20)

get.summary: Get all chats for the authenticated user

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all chats in a specific project. Admin ID is automatically extracted from JWT token.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of chats to return (default: 20)

get.summary: Get all chats for a specific project

get.description: Retrieves information about a specific chat. User ID is automatically extracted from JWT token for access control.

403.description: User does not have access to this chat

get.summary: Get a specific chat by ID

delete.description: Deactivates a chat (soft delete). User ID is automatically extracted from JWT token for access control.

403.description: User does not have access to this chat

post.description: Creates a new chat or returns existing one between admin and participant. Admin ID is automatically extracted from JWT token. Returns metadata indicating whether chat was created or retrieved.
post.summary: Create or get chat with participant

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of messages for a specific chat. User ID is automatically extracted from JWT token for access control.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of messages to return (default: 20)

403.description: User does not have access to this chat

post.description: Creates a new message in a specific chat. User ID is automatically extracted from JWT token.

400.description: Invalid message content or spam protection triggered

403.description: User does not have access to this chat

post.summary: Send a message to a chat

post.description: Sends a message from admin to every participant in the project. Creates a personal chat if it does not exist.
post.summary: Broadcast message to all project participants

put.description: Marks all messages in a chat as read for the authenticated user. User ID is automatically extracted from JWT token.

403.description: User does not have access to this chat

get.description: Retrieves the online status of the authenticated user

post.description: Gets or creates a chat between admin and participant. No authentication required for mobile app usage. Returns metadata indicating whether chat was created or retrieved.

parameters.name: participantId
parameters.description: External participant ID (string) provided by mobile app

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of messages for a specific chat. No authentication required for mobile app usage.

parameters.name: participantId
parameters.description: External participant ID (string) provided by mobile app

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of messages to return (default: 20)

get.summary: Get messages for a chat (Mobile App)

post.description: Creates a new message in a specific chat. No authentication required for mobile app usage.

parameters.name: participantId
parameters.description: External participant ID (string) provided by mobile app

400.description: Invalid message content or spam protection triggered

post.summary: Send a message to a chat (Mobile App)

post.description: Registers or updates a push token for a participant identified by participantId and projectUniqueId.
post.summary: Register device token for mobile (no auth)

post.description: Deactivates a previously registered push token.
Sends a test push notification to the currently authenticated admin user.
Sends a test Expo push notification to a specific user by participantId and projectUniqueId.

message.example: This is a test Expo push notification

get.description: Returns statistics about registered devices and push tokens.
Returns the current configuration status of Expo Push Notifications.

post.description: Simple test endpoint to debug validation issues.

get.description: Returns key performance indicators for the specified project over a date range. Admin is taken from JWT.
Returns time series of new participants and a list of the latest participants. Admin is taken from JWT.
get.summary: New participants timeseries and latest list

get.description: Returns counts of active participants, silent share and average messages per participant for the period.
Returns new chats timeseries and chat status KPIs for the period. Admin is taken from JWT.

info.title: Chat CRM API
info.description: API documentation for Chat CRM application

uniqueId.description: Unique project ID assigned by admin
Unique project ID assigned by admin
Unique project ID assigned by admin

participantId.description: Unique identifier for the participant within the project

id.description: Unique identifier of the participant record

participantId.description: Unique identifier for the participant within the project

isOnline.description: Whether the participant is currently online

lastSeen.description: Last time the participant was seen online

createdAt.description: When the participant was added to the project

content.example: Hello! How can I help you?

senderId.description: ID of the user who sent the message

unreadCount.description: Number of unread messages for the requesting user

isNewChat.description: Whether the chat was created in this request

createdAt.description: When the chat was originally created

accessedAt.description: When the chat was last accessed

isOnline.description: Whether the user is currently online

lastSeen.description: Last time the user was seen

chatId.description: Chat ID where the message belongs

senderId.description: ID of the user who sent the message

content.example: Hello! How can I help you today?

type.description: Type of the message. IMAGE for image files, FILE for other files, TEXT for text messages

read.description: Whether the message has been read

readAt.description: Timestamp when the message was read

totalCount.description: Total number of messages in the chat

content.example: Hello! How can I help you today?

type.description: Type of the message. Use IMAGE for image files, FILE for other files, TEXT for text messages

metadata.description: Additional metadata for the message (e.g., file info, emoji data)

content.description: Content of the message to broadcast
content.example: Hello everyone! Please check the latest updates.

type.description: Type of the message. IMAGE for image files, FILE for other files, TEXT for text messages

metadata.description: Additional metadata for the message (e.g., file info, emoji data)

chat.description: Minimal chat information containing only identifiers

participantId.description: External participant ID within the project

token.description: Expo push token (starts with ExponentPushToken[...] or ExpoPushToken[...])
